name: Yumi Girl HighSchool Simulator
description:
We present Yumi high school girls life game. This school simulator 3d game will entertain you with amazing school life activities. As a player, you will act like a real school girl to shine as a high school star in studies and fun activities throughout the game. As the virtual school girl, reaches high school and meet with your friends and take some challenges in school. In the first stage, you have to pass the classroom MCQ test to show your brilliance in the class and to secure the best positions in the classroom exams. Then there is a race competition in the school sports so get ready for that and win the race competitions. Now there are the fights with your rival girl of the class so enjoy the fun of fighting by winning the fights. And there are so many fun and entertaining activities as a virtual high school girl with amazing animations and simulation fun. Enjoy school life to remember your best days to explore the fun and adventure by accepting the challenges in this Yumi school life game for free.

Key Features:
-High-quality graphics with amazing gameplay for high school life game
-Smooth controls for fighting, race, and for other simulation fun
-Multiple anime girl characters with amazing dresses variety
-Challenging & entertaining tasks as a schoolgirl
-Exciting fun and endless entertainment
